translated: They become mentally absorbed in emptiness.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
translated: â€œWhen they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the union of eye, form, and consciousness is empty of the unlimited.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya barðŸ”½yid la byed de /

translated: â€œWhen they practice the perfection of wisdom, without dedicating the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects, they pay attention to the idea that the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact that is the union of eye, form, and consciousness is empty of no beginning and no end.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la /
